subject: Long messages are truncated.
msgSnippet: I try to use the methods assert and fail with long messages. These messages are truncated after about 80 characers with the last part of the message
messageBody:
I try to use the methods "assert" and "fail" with long messages. These messages are truncated after about 80 characers with the last part of the message replaced by "...".

Is it possible to change the configuration of JUnit to allow long messages of about 200 charactes?

/Håkan
